name: Embers Journey
description:
The history of Ember, a fire salamander without friends because he burn everything. Has come a strong winter, and every animal in the area was frozen. Only Ember can save the other animals.

Created for the Epic Games Spring Jam 2020. Solo developer
Modifier catagory: Army of One

Controls:

W,D to move
Left mouse: Fireball
Right mouse: Special
Space: Jump
Escape: quit game

Assets used:
Unreal Docs - https://docs.unrealengine.com/en-US/Engine/Rendering/Materials/HowTo/CreatingLay...
Infinity Blade - Effects
Sounds from https://freesound.org
Music by Bensound.
